Eligibility for Benefits Under PL 116-315 After Remarriage
Under
PL 116-315
, which is effective January 5, 2021, a surviving spouse who remarries upon attaining age 55 retains eligibility for DIC.Â  The date of remarriage can be any date, however benefits restored under
PL 116-315
may not be paid for any period prior to January 5, 2021.
Furthermore, under
PL 116-315
, a surviving spouse who remarries upon attaining age 57 retains eligibility for MOHP benefits.
